text: Yinci, ping an la de zhiyi, tamen dabaile diren, da wude [zhu] sha sile jie lu te. An la ciyu ta [da wude] wangquan he zhihui, bing ba suo yiyu de [zhishi] jiaoshou ta. Yao bushi an la yi yibufen ren cuobai ling yibufen ren, name, dadi biding hunluanle. Dan an la dui zhong shijie shi you en de.
